title: Project Ozone 2 Reloaded崩溃
author: 刘赞宸
txt_content:
Forge16141.7.10原版运行正常
在Curse上的整合和我的崩溃报如下
报告：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1hs01m1A
文件：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kUW8RHl、
如果有dalao能直接整合一下也不错（已做好被剁的准备）
如若能解决，可加报酬

replies.author: 张钰灝
replies.txt_content:
冲突的不少
universalsingularities{1.7.10-8.0} [Universal Singularities] (Universal Singularities [Version 8]-1.7.10.jar) 
eternalsingularity{1.7.10-.1.0.3} [Eternal Singularity] (EternalSingularity-1.7.10-1.0.4.jar) UE        betterquesting{2.0.224} [Better Questing] (BetterQuesting-2.0.224.jar)
wanionlib{1.7.10-1.5} [WanionLib] (WanionLib-1.7.10-1.5.jar) 
avaritiaddons{1.3b} [Avaritiaddons] (Avaritiaddons-1.3b.jar) 
betterquesting{2.0.224} [Better Questing] (BetterQuesting-2.0.224.jar)
Magneticraft{0.6.0-final} [Magneticraft] (magneticraft-0.6.1-final.jar) 
packguard{2.3.0} [PackGuard] (PackGuard-1.7.10-2.3.0d.jar)
questbook{2.1.0-1.7.10} [Better Questing Quest Book] (questbook-2.1.0-1.7.10.jar) 
bq_standard{2.0.127} [Standard Expansion] (StandardExpansion-2.0.127.jar)
UniDict{1.7.10-2.9.2} [UniDict] (UniDict-1.7.10-2.9.2.jar) 

并且还有重复MOD，请把上面的所有MOD删掉即可解决问题

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kVDMJcj我这直接整好可以直接玩的
